185954026.review:
Данная игра больше похожа на техно дэмку нежели на что-то завершенное. В начале сильно увлекает, но потом начинает душить однообразием. Раз за разом вас заставляют делать одни и те же действия. Построили один муравейник - отлично, вот вам переезд и стройте заново. Прошли миссию - хорошо, а теперь ее же, только с небольшим модификатором.
Я бы посоветовал брать только по скидке и на многое не надеяться.

185951101.review:
First of all, i have WAY more hours on this game than steam had logged. I play offline a lot, and I kinda wish steam would track your offline hours so I could see just how much time I've sunk into my favorite games XD

Anyhow! I definitely recommend this one, it's not a super challenging RTS out the gate, though it does require some learning to get the hang off (5.1 the myth the legend, I think the only case where ignoring the narrator is the only correct option to succeed. Honestly if this could be fixed to properly imply that you should only tunnel vision 1 mound during each night cycle that would probably help people. I know after I looked up what to do I can now consistently smoke extreme without sweating too hard) It's addicting in a good way to me, because I've starting getting better at the game to the point I'm actually trying to get all of the in game achievements. I have no idea how some of them are gonna be possible but I am gonna try it! Of course steam still gives me achievements regardless, but I still want the in game achievements. Just because.

This is actual one of very few games I'd love to see DLC for. Like... I have no real idea what kinda DLC that could be provided other than "Hey! Here's like this whole other campaign you can play!" but i'd genuinely be interested. Even just having more "story" scenarios with pre-existing ant types would make me happy. Like i'd like more Leafcutter maps, and Fire ant maps, even some more Matabele maps would be cool. I don't need new ants, although this game did introduce me to the Matabele which are pretty neat, but I genuinely just want more content with Leaftcutters and Fire ants (because they're my favorites IRL and in game so sue me im biased :P )
Heck you could just give me a Campaign where I'm playing as only 1 colony  for five major missions and I'd love it.
Also I mean... Maybe a DLC where we get some silly continuation of the main story? honestly with that one I just want anything- a visual comic a novella, just anything. I was caught off guard and was pleasantly surprised by the ending.
last note- please sell the soundtrack. I'd but it in a heartbeat. I just... every Leaftcutter song lives rent free (The night one in particualr) in my brain and the Matabele's day song plays randomly during the day in my head. They're just so good!

also just an off the wall suggestion/request to the devs, I know it would be like REALLY difficult to pull off compared to an ant RTS, but maybe a bee colony? I just.... like bees and it would be interesting. maybe. again maybe a DLC, that just features a basic honey bee. I know we'd probably be missing the underground digging segments, but it could be made up for with other threats probably. Like bears or other honey loving creatures...and parasites and ect.

184810263.review:
Empires of the Undergrowth es un juego de estrategia en tiempo real que te sumerge en el mundo de las colonias de hormigas. Combina gestión de recursos, combate táctico y un enfoque educativo sobre la biología de las hormigas. Con gráficos detallados, mecánicas adictivas y desafíos variados, ofrece una experiencia única y entretenida.

Aunque el juego aún está en acceso anticipado y carece de una campaña completa, su potencial es enorme. Si te gustan los juegos de estrategia con un giro fresco y educativo, este título es altamente recomendado.

Puntuación: 8.5/10

184801707.review: Pretty good overall.    I do wish that the game had one or two more missions per ant type - it leaves you wanting more.  I like the inclusion of an easy mode for people that want to play through the story, but don't have time to get good at the game.  I did play through on a mix of hard/normal on new game plus mode after finishing.  The narrator should get a job voicing over documentaries if he doesn't already have one.  Very good!

Your anthill is on an incline, angry ants cannot play marbles.
One of your worker ants does a great impression of you, she can even do the mandibles!
Your anthill has been recarpeted.
Your ants demand cable.
Other Queens never forget their ants' birthdays.
Your anthill is damp. Install central heating.
The very rotten wood yawns with anticipation of your next fascinating move.
Your anthill floor is lumpy. Order your ants to jump up and down.
Tardigrades stalk your anthill... beware.
You have an excess of fire ants. There's a word for Queens like you.

183936951.review:
Ant warfare on a strategic scale presenting unique challenges to overcome.

I've had quite a few failed campaigns in this game and I honestly think that's great because it just proves the developers aren't afraid to give a good challenge. On some levels it's a little tedious with sudden large difficulty spikes, but once you know it happens, or can happen, you prepare more in advance than you would without those spikes.

I have yet to complete the 1.0 campaign at the time of writing this review, but so far, it has been good. My favorite level has easily been the army ants level. The dread of seeing them march towards you is something else.

Has a lot of good variety and challenges to entertain you. I would recommend it.

It is 2024, and I can finally play as a termite!!! 11/10.

Seriously, this game has been in development for over 8 years, and Slug Disco has done a fantastic job and finally released it from early access. Thank you for the arachnophobia mode. Otherwise I'd have a heart attack every time one of those critters showed up. Also, thanks for the free play mode. I just want to grow my termite colony, for now.

183614702.review: Es lo que ves, un RTS básico bastante divertido a mi parecer, donde controlas colonias de hormigas y termitas, y buscas hacer crecer tu propia colonia mientras que eliminas cualquier posible amenaza, la historia del juego se avanza por niveles,  por lo que tendrás si o si que pasar un nivel antes de ir al siguiente, por lo que te puedes quedar estancado si no sabes que hacer, después de todo EL JUEGO NO ES FÁCIL, tienes que prestar atención todo el tiempo a lo que pasa porque si cometes un solo descuido pierdes, AQUÍ A DIFERENCIA DE OTROS JUEGOS NO HAY FORMA DE GUARDAR UNA PARTIDA (CAPITULO) YA INICIADO, POR LO QUE SI JUEGAS DEBES TERMINARLO PORQUE SINO TENDRÁS QUE HACERLO TODO DE CERO  Y FÁCILMENTE UN CAPITULO TE DURA ENTRE 30 A 60 MINUTOS, y si pierdes debes hacer todo el capitulo de nuevo,  por lo que debes tener en cuenta si tienes tiempo para poder jugarlo o te vas a frustrar por no poderlo pasar por la falta de tiempo.

183589691.review: 从盗版开始的喜欢，到现在更喜欢了（虽然依旧是个极限都打不过的fvv）

183583924.review: i like that in free play you can do any thing you want

183581339.review:
Need to play every map twice to figure out how stuff works. They could do a better job of explaining what the ant powers are. In the story mode, you cannot save during missions. Having the ability to save is not a big ask I think. You need to restart a level if you need to quit the game for any reason.

It is a good game though, I should mention. I like the gameplay very much. It is the usability of the game itself which makes the game harder to play. Sad to see myself quit after playing 16 hours in two days, but I don't feel like playing every level twice any more.

Edit: I keep coming back to  this game, so I change my review. Kudos to the devs!

183576287.review: Great game, was great in early access and since 1.0 the devs have added many features/modes. massively increasing replayability. Making an already great rts game even greater. Would recommend for any fan of rts who also happens to love the insects and other little critters of our world.

183573747.review: this is the best game I had ever played it is more fun than any other bug game I had played

183540682.review: 游戏本体很不错，玩法有趣，而且有很多科普的东西。但是这个游戏有很多bug，比如偶尔游戏内ui卡了不能右键和建造了，而游戏是没有随时保存的导致无法SL刷新UI就显得非常傻逼，制作组也在持续更新游戏，希望之后会把此类bug都修复了XD

183536459.review: Game so good I bought it for several of my friends too :)

183531569.review:
The negative reviews of this game are BS, i'll talk about the negative reviews because there's too much good in EOTU to talk about in just a review, the gameplay goes so quick that every second lost lowers your chances of survival, the player control over the game is also nowhere near simple or too limiting as you'll find yourself micro-managing combat and food toggles, splitting groups into smaller ones for extra seconds and making creatures fight each other later into the game. 90% of all levels are races against the clock in disguise and you're never given a break, if you find yourself waiting and doing nothing during a game then there's something you're yet to be aware of, upping your difficulty should fix that.

The only complaint i have is the lack of multiplayer despite the game exploring such possibility in skirmish and extra levels and some perfomance issues, both of which are tech limitations just like in-level save systems.

Oh and those who say the game lacks content and replayability, BS too, half the levels are way too replayable, there's dozens of extra content, Remix mode is now a thing and there's also custom matches you can play as well as silly minigames which trigger every now and then, beta content is also released monthly and... No sadly you can't mod the game at all but you can edit your save-file too if you're bored!

183531032.review: 一直在更新，一直在输出，你值得拥有！
